All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
HCollection
The root interface in the collection hierarchy.
HIterator
An iterator over a collection.
HIteratorState
This ENUM contains the different states of an HListIterator
HList
An ordered collection (also known as a sequence).
HListIterator
An iterator for lists that allows the programmer to traverse the list in either direction, modify the list during iteration, and obtain the iterator's current position in the list.
IteratorTest
Summary: This test suite provides tests for the StackAdapter.StackIterator class methods

Test Suite Design: The design of this thest suite is all about testing each method of the StackIterator class.
StackAdapter
Class StackAdapter that adapts class Vector.
TestDeletion
Summary: Class TestDeletion checks the operation of Methods that remove objects from a stack.
TestInsertion
Summary: Class TestInsertion checks with its tests the operation of Methods that insert objects on a Stack.
TestRunner
Main class to execute myTest
TestTweaks
Summary: Class TestTweaks controls with its tests The operation Of the methods that inspect the objects of a stack without changing it.
Vector
Class Vector of Java Micro Edition, CLDC1.1
VectorTest
Summary: This test suite provides information about the correct working of the class Vector, which works as the adaptee of the StackAdapter class

Test Suite Design: The design of this thest suite is all about testing each method of the Vector class.
